subject: World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
Soccer
lead_paragraph: After advancing out of group play, the United States will face Belgium, which beat the Americans in 2011 in one of Jurgen Klinsmann’s first games as coach and dominated them in 2013 in a friendly.
snippet: After advancing out of group play, the United States will face Belgium, which beat the Americans in 2011 in one of Jurgen Klinsmann’s first games as coach and dominated them in 2013 in a friendly.
